README:
This Cucumber environment is bundled with:
- PicoContainer DI framework
- JMock2
- Mockito
Hiker.feature:
Feature: hitch-hiker playing scrabble

Scenario: hitch-hiker playing scrabble in the past
Given the hitch-hiker selects some tiles
When they spell 6 times 9
Then the score is 42
cyber-dojo.sh:
rm -f *.class
CLASSES=.:`ls /cucumber/*.jar | tr '\n' ':'`
javac -Xlint:unchecked -cp $CLASSES  *.java
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
  java -cp $CLASSES org.junit.runner.JUnitCore `ls -1 *Test*.class | grep -v '\\$' | sed 's/\(.*\)\..*/\1/'`
fi
instructions:
This is an instructor-led exercise.
There are no written instructions.
Your instructor will explain the exercise.
